name: İnterrogation (itch) (SpinnerPangolin)
description:
STORY

You're Vincent an assasin to hired for killing rival family's daughter. You completed your mission successfully but police caught you with corpse of your victim so you are arested and you should persuade the police you didnt killed Kyra Placeholder.Can you do it or will you sentenced 30 years for murder?

Note:Read İnstall Guide.

System Specifications

OS: Windows 10/11/8/7

Direct X: DX11

Required Space : 639 KB

Note: Some lesser parts of game is cannot completed  if you didnt get any ending screen after correctly answering all questions than consider yourself as a winner.
